My fav scene 1:00:16

In the original film ...there is detailing even in the names of characters .... Alli ( Nandini in bollywood) is synonym for parvati , Shiva's wife  .. ... while Mahadevan( sharad in bollywood) is lord shiva ... in the legend.. ganga( Avni) desires for shiva just as in the movie ...in another aspect( as per malayalam movie) ...ganga falls in love with Mahadevan through his poems and she is not entirely happy with her husband but loves him though .. her mind knows she can't complete her desire ...so her unconscious mind pose as nagavalli( manjulika) to get Mahadevan ... in the final sequence she says now i am completely an asset of nakulan ( Sidharth) that means she forgot her love for Mahadevan and now is happy with her husband
